description: Volkner`s Fan Rotom battled during the Pok√©mon World Tournament Hyper Class match against Ash Ketchum. It was set out to battle Ash`s Gengar in place of Volkner`s Luxray who was being taunted and didn`t match up well against it. Rotom on the other hand was quickly able to defeat Ash`s Gengar with a combo of quick speed, Thunder Wave and Hex. It later faced Ash`s Lucario where it was defeated.
name: Rotom (Denji)
